instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree outlines the automated process for a coffee machine. It begins with checking if the cleaning process is finished and there is enough water. If not, it proceeds to handle the water tank by removing, filling, and placing it back in the coffee machine. Similarly, it manages the marro (coffee grounds) tank.

Once these tasks are completed, the sequence progresses to opening the coffee machine, ensuring a clean cup is ready, and then switching on the machine. Subsequently, it handles placing the coffee cup, selecting the type of coffee, brewing the coffee, and adding milk or sugar based on user preferences. Finally, it ensures the cup is removed and performs any necessary cleaning.

The behavior tree employs various conditions, timeouts, retries, and actions to automate the entire coffee-making process, including maintenance tasks like tank refilling and cleaning. This comprehensive automation allows for efficient and seamless operation of the coffee machine.
output:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root main_tree_to_execute="BehaviorTree">
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="AutoClean">
        <Fallback>
            <Condition ID="IsCleanProcessFinished"/>
            <Fallback>
                <Condition ID="IsThereEnoughWater"/>
                <Sequence>
                    <Timeout msec="5000">
                        <Condition ID="IsWaterTankRemoved"/>
                    </Timeout>
                    <Fallback>
                        <Timeout msec="5000">
                            <Condition ID="IsWaterTankFull"/>
                        </Timeout>
                        <Action ID="FillWaterTank"/>
                    </Fallback>
                    <RetryUntilSuccesful num_attempts="100">
                        <Condition ID="IsWaterTankPlacedInCoffeMachine"/>
                    </RetryUntilSuccesful>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
            <Fallback>
                <Inverter>
                    <Condition ID="IsMarroTankFull"/>
                </Inverter>
                <Sequence>
                    <Timeout msec="5000">
                        <Condition ID="IsMarroTankRemoved"/>
                    </Timeout>
                    <Fallback>
                        <Timeout msec="5000">
                            <Condition ID="IsMarroTankEmpty"/>
                        </Timeout>
                        <Action ID="EmptyMarroTank"/>
                    </Fallback>
                    <RetryUntilSuccesful num_attempts="100">
                        <Condition ID="IsMarroTankPlacedInCoffeMachine"/>
                    </RetryUntilSuccesful>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
        </Fallback>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="BehaviorTree">
        <Sequence>
            <SubTree ID="OpenCoffeMachine" __shared_blackboard="false"/>
            <SubTree ID="AutoClean" __shared_blackboard="false"/>
            <SubTree ID="PutCoffeCup" __shared_blackboard="false"/>
            <SubTree ID="CoffeType" __shared_blackboard="false"/>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="CoffeType">
        <Sequence>
            <Fallback>
                <Timeout msec="5000">
                    <Condition ID="IsDesiredCoffeSelected"/>
                </Timeout>
                <Action ID="PressDesiredCoffe"/>
            </Fallback>
            <Timeout msec="5000">
                <Condition ID="IsCoffeFinished"/>
            </Timeout>
            <Timeout msec="5000">
                <Condition ID="HasCupOffCoffeBeenRemoved"/>
            </Timeout>
            <Timeout msec="5000">
                <Fallback>
                    <Condition ID="HasHumanAddedCleaningCup"/>
                    <Sequence>
                        <Action ID="PlaceCleanCup"/>
                        <Action ID="SwitchOffCoffeMachine"/>
                    </Sequence>
                </Fallback>
            </Timeout>
            <Timeout msec="5000">
                <Fallback name="arallel">
                    <Condition ID="HasHumanAddedMilk"/>
                    <Sequence>
                        <Fallback>
                            <Inverter>
                                <Condition ID="IsMilkDesired"/>
                            </Inverter>
                            <Action ID="AddMilktoCoffe"/>
                        </Fallback>
                        <Fallback>
                            <Inverter>
                                <Condition ID="IsSugarDesired"/>
                            </Inverter>
                            <Action ID="AddSugarToCoffe"/>
                        </Fallback>
                    </Sequence>
                </Fallback>
            </Timeout>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="OpenCoffeMachine">
        <Fallback>
            <Condition ID="IsMachineOpen"/>
            <Sequence>
                <RetryUntilSuccesful num_attempts="10">
                    <Condition ID="IsCleanCupReady"/>
                </RetryUntilSuccesful>
                <Fallback>
                    <Timeout msec="5000">
                        <Condition ID="IsMachineOpen"/>
                    </Timeout>
                    <Action ID="SwitchOnCoffeMachine"/>
                </Fallback>
            </Sequence>
        </Fallback>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="PutCoffeCup">
        <Fallback>
            <Timeout msec="5000">
                <Condition ID="IsCoffeCupReady"/>
            </Timeout>
            <Action ID="PlaceCoffeCup"/>
        </Fallback>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <TreeNodesModel>
        <Action ID="AddMilktoCoffe"/>
        <Action ID="AddSugarToCoffe"/>
        <SubTree ID="AutoClean">
            <input_port default="false" name="__shared_blackboard">If false (default), the Subtree has an isolated blackboard and needs port remapping</input_port>
        </SubTree>
        <SubTree ID="CoffeType">
            <input_port default="false" name="__shared_blackboard">If false (default), the Subtree has an isolated blackboard and needs port remapping</input_port>
        </SubTree>
        <Action ID="EmptyMarroTank"/>
        <Action ID="FillWaterTank"/>
        <Condition ID="HasCupOffCoffeBeenRemoved"/>
        <Condition ID="HasHumanAddedCleaningCup"/>
        <Condition ID="HasHumanAddedMilk"/>
        <Condition ID="IsCleanCupReady"/>
        <Condition ID="IsCleanProcessFinished"/>
        <Condition ID="IsCoffeCupReady"/>
        <Condition ID="IsCoffeFinished"/>
        <Condition ID="IsDesiredCoffeSelected"/>
        <Condition ID="IsMachineOpen"/>
        <Condition ID="IsMarroTankEmpty"/>
        <Condition ID="IsMarroTankFull"/>
        <Condition ID="IsMarroTankPlacedInCoffeMachine"/>
        <Condition ID="IsMarroTankRemoved"/>
        <Condition ID="IsMilkDesired"/>
        <Condition ID="IsSugarDesired"/>
        <Condition ID="IsThereEnoughWater"/>
        <Condition ID="IsWaterTankFull"/>
        <Condition ID="IsWaterTankPlacedInCoffeMachine"/>
        <Condition ID="IsWaterTankRemoved"/>
        <SubTree ID="OpenCoffeMachine">
            <input_port default="false" name="__shared_blackboard">If false (default), the Subtree has an isolated blackboard and needs port remapping</input_port>
        </SubTree>
        <Action ID="PlaceCleanCup"/>
        <Action ID="PlaceCoffeCup"/>
        <Action ID="PressDesiredCoffe"/>
        <SubTree ID="PutCoffeCup">
            <input_port default="false" name="__shared_blackboard">If false (default), the Subtree has an isolated blackboard and needs port remapping</input_port>
        </SubTree>
        <Action ID="SwitchOffCoffeMachine"/>
        <Action ID="SwitchOnCoffeMachine"/>
    </TreeNodesModel>
    <!-- ////////// -->
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree represents the decision-making process for an animal or creature. The tree contains multiple sequences and conditions that dictate the actions of the entity based on its environment and internal state.

The main sequence involves three fallback options:
1. If the entity is on a pasture during the day, it will leave the shed, find a random pasture field, and move there.
2. If the entity is on a pasture at night and not in a shed, it will find a shed, move towards it, and enter the shed.
3. If it's daytime and not in a shed, it will perform a random move.

The tree also includes various conditions and actions such as determining if the entity is adult, carnivorous, hungry, pregnant, etc., and performing corresponding actions like eating prey, giving birth, laying eggs, moving, sleeping, etc.

Overall, the behavior tree orchestrates the entity's behaviors based on its surroundings and internal states, ensuring it acts appropriately in different situations.
output:
<root main_tree_to_execute="MainTree">
    <!--  ===================================  -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
        <FallbackStar>
            <SequenceStar>
                <Condition ID="IsOnPasture"/>
                <Condition ID="IsDay"/>
                <Condition ID="IsInShed"/>
                <Action ID="LeaveShed"/>
                <Action ID="FindRandomPastureField"/>
                <Action ID="Move"/>
            </SequenceStar>
            <SequenceStar>
                <Condition ID="IsOnPasture"/>
                <Condition ID="IsNight"/>
                <Inverter>
                    <Condition ID="IsInShed"/>
                </Inverter>
                <Action ID="FindShed"/>
                <Action ID="Move"/>
                <Action ID="EnterShed"/>
            </SequenceStar>
            <SequenceStar>
                <Condition ID="IsDay"/>
                <Inverter>
                    <Condition ID="IsInShed"/>
                </Inverter>
                <Action ID="RandomMove"/>
            </SequenceStar>
        </FallbackStar>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!--  ===================================  -->
    <TreeNodesModel>
        <Condition ID="CanHaveSex"/>
        <Action ID="EatPrey"/>
        <Action ID="EnterShed"/>
        <Action ID="FindPrey"/>
        <Action ID="FindRandomPastureField"/>
        <Action ID="FindRetreat"/>
        <Action ID="FindShed"/>
        <Action ID="GiveBirth"/>
        <Condition ID="IsAdult"/>
        <Condition ID="IsCarnivore"/>
        <Condition ID="IsDay"/>
        <Condition ID="IsEgg"/>
        <Condition ID="IsEggLayer"/>
        <Condition ID="IsFemale"/>
        <Condition ID="IsHerbivore"/>
        <Condition ID="IsHungry"/>
        <Condition ID="IsInShed"/>
        <Condition ID="IsMale"/>
        <Condition ID="IsNight"/>
        <Condition ID="IsOnPasture"/>
        <Condition ID="IsPregnant"/>
        <Condition ID="IsProducer"/>
        <Condition ID="IsReadyToGiveBirth"/>
        <Condition ID="IsWoodVermin"/>
        <Condition ID="IsYoung"/>
        <Action ID="KillPrey"/>
        <Action ID="LayEgg"/>
        <Action ID="LeaveShed"/>
        <Action ID="Move"/>
        <Action ID="Produce"/>
        <Action ID="RandomMove"/>
        <Action ID="Sleep"/>
        <Action ID="TryHaveSex"/>
    </TreeNodesModel>
    <!--  ===================================  -->
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree orchestrates a robot's actions in a competition. The robot is initialized and then executes multiple tasks concurrently or sequentially, such as checking the presence of specific conditions, controlling its eyes' display, handling palets (small discs), and managing the timer.

It begins by checking if the robot is ready and then proceeds to perform several tasks simultaneously, including monitoring the presence of a lever, starting and stopping a timer, sorting palets based on their color, displaying various images through its eyes, and adding scores based on the completed tasks.

If certain conditions are met, it performs specific movements to handle the palets, adjust its position, and interact with different areas of the competition field. Additionally, it handles interruptions and failures gracefully, ensuring that critical tasks are completed and scores are updated accordingly.
output:
<root main_tree_to_execute="BehaviorTree">
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="BehaviorTree">
        <Sequence>
            <Condition ID="RobotPret" />
            <RealParallel> 
                <SubTree ID="TiretteAndStop" y_mul="y_mul" theta_mul="theta_mul" camp="camp" tirette_presente_last_tick="tirette_presente_last_tick" palets_depart="palets_depart" palet_pente="palet_pente" palet_chaos="palet_chaos" />
                <SubTree ID="MinuterieAndstartAndStopWhenTimeout" palets_depart="palets_depart" palet_pente="palet_pente" palet_chaos="palet_chaos" tirette_presente_last_tick="tirette_presente_last_tick" />
                <SubTree ID="Trier les palets" camp="camp" palets_depart="palets_depart" palet_pente="palet_pente" y_mul="y_mul" theta_mul="theta_mul" palet_chaos="palet_chaos" />
                <SubTree ID="Palets zone chaos" camp="camp" palet_chaos="palet_chaos" y_mul="y_mul" theta_mul="theta_mul" />
                <SubTree ID="Yeux" camp="camp"/>
            </RealParallel>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="TiretteAndStop">
        <ForceSuccess>
            <Fallback>
                <Sequence>
                    <Condition ID="TiretteLaserPresente"/>
                    <SetBlackboard value="true" output_key="tirette_presente_last_tick"/>
                    <Action ID="Arreter le robot" />
                    <Action ID="VitesseConstante" linear_x="0.0" linear_y="0.0" angular_z="0.0" />
                    <Action ID="DefinirLeScore" score="40"/>
                    <Action ID="ArreterLaMinuterie"/> 
                    <Action ID="RestartRosbags" />
                    <SetBlackboard value="0" output_key="palets_depart"/>
                    <SetBlackboard value="0" output_key="palet_pente"/>
                    <Fallback>
                        <Sequence>
                            <Condition ID="LaVoieEstLibre-Gauche"/>
                            <Action ID="DefinirPosition" theta="0" x="-0.18" y="-1.18"/>
                            <SetBlackboard value="jaune" output_key="camp"/>
                            <SetBlackboard value="1.0" output_key="y_mul"/>
                            <SetBlackboard value="1.0" output_key="sym_theta"/>
                            <Action ms="500" ID="Attendre"/>
                        </Sequence>
                        <Sequence>
                            <Action ID="DefinirPosition" theta="0" x="-0.18" y="1.18"/>
                            <SetBlackboard value="violet" output_key="camp"/>
                            <SetBlackboard value="-1.0" output_key="y_mul"/>
                            <SetBlackboard value="-1.0" output_key="theta_mul"/>
                            <Action ms="500" ID="Attendre"/>
                        </Sequence>
                    </Fallback>
                </Sequence>
                <Sequence>
                    <SetBlackboard value="false" output_key="tirette_presente_last_tick"/>
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
        </ForceSuccess>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="MinuterieAndstartAndStopWhenTimeout">
        <ForceSuccess>
            <Fallback>
                <BlackboardCheckString return_on_mismatch="FAILURE" value_A="{tirette_presente_last_tick}" value_B="true">
                    <Sequence>
                        <Inverter>
                            <Condition ID="TiretteLaserPresente"/>
                        </Inverter>
                        <Action seconds="88" ID="LancerLaMinuterie"/>
                        <SetBlackboard value="1" output_key="palets_depart"/>
                    </Sequence>
                </BlackboardCheckString>
                <Sequence>
                    <Inverter>
                        <Condition ID="MinuterieNonEcoulee"/>
                    </Inverter>
                    <SetBlackboard value="0" output_key="palets_depart"/>
                    <SetBlackboard value="0" output_key="palet_pente"/>
                    <SetBlackboard value="0" output_key="palet_chaos"/>
                    <Action ID="Arreter le robot"/>
                    <!--Action ID="VitesseConstante" linear_x="0.0" linear_y="0.0" angular_z="0.0" /-->
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
        </ForceSuccess>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="Trier les palets">
        <ForceSuccess>
            <Fallback>
                <BlackboardCheckString return_on_mismatch="FAILURE" value_A="{palets_depart}" value_B="1">
                    <Fallback>
                        <BlackboardCheckString return_on_mismatch="FAILURE" value_A="{camp}" value_B="jaune">
                            <Sequence>
                                <ReactiveSequence>
                                    <Condition ID="LaVoieEstLibre-Devant"/>
                                    <JouerUnRosbag nom="r2_jaune_13pts.bag" topics="/r2/mobile_base_controller/cmd_vel" />
                                </ReactiveSequence>
                                <Action ID="AjouterAuScore" score="13"/>
                                <SetBlackboard value="0" output_key="palets_depart"/>
                                <SetBlackboard value="0" output_key="palet_chaos"/>
                            </Sequence>
                        </BlackboardCheckString>
                        <BlackboardCheckString return_on_mismatch="FAILURE" value_A="{camp}" value_B="violet">
                            <Sequence>
                            <ReactiveSequence>
                                <Condition ID="LaVoieEstLibre-Devant"/>
                                <JouerUnRosbag nom="r2_violet_13pts.bag" topics="/r2/mobile_base_controller/cmd_vel" />
                            </ReactiveSequence>
                            <Action ID="AjouterAuScore" score="13"/>
                            <SetBlackboard value="0" output_key="palets_depart"/>
                            <SetBlackboard value="0" output_key="palet_chaos"/>
                            </Sequence>
                        </BlackboardCheckString>
                        <Action ID="VitesseConstante" linear_x="0.0" linear_y="0.0" angular_z="0.0" />
                    </Fallback>
                </BlackboardCheckString>
                <BlackboardCheckString return_on_mismatch="FAILURE" value_A="{palet_pente}" value_B="1">
                    <Sequence>
                        <Action ID="Aller" theta="90" x="0.8" y="1.2" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="aller au pied de la balance"/>
                        <Action ID="AjouterAuScore" score="12"/>
                        <SetBlackboard value="0" output_key="palet_pente"/>
                    </Sequence>
                </BlackboardCheckString>
            </Fallback>
        </ForceSuccess>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="Yeux">
        <RealParallel>
            <Sequence>
                <Action message="content.gif" repetition="1" defaut="1" ID="AfficheYeux" fps="2"/>
                <Action ms="10000" ID="Attendre"/>
                <Action message="carre.gif" repetition="1" defaut="1" ID="AfficheYeux" fps="10"/>
                <Action ms="10000" ID="Attendre"/>
                <Action message="folie.gif" repetition="1" defaut="1" ID="AfficheYeux" fps="2"/>
                <Action ms="10000" ID="Attendre"/>
                <Action message="perdu.gif" repetition="1" defaut="1" ID="AfficheYeux" fps="4"/>
                <Action ms="10000" ID="Attendre"/>
                <Action message="stardust.gif" repetition="1" defaut="1" ID="AfficheYeux" fps="1"/>
                <Action ms="10000" ID="Attendre"/>
            </Sequence>
            <ForceSuccess>
                <ReactiveFallback>
                    <Sequence>
                        <Inverter>
                            <Condition ID="RobotEnBonneSante"/>
                        </Inverter>  
                        <Inverter>
                            <Condition ID="MinuterieNonEcoulee"/>
                        </Inverter>  
                        <Action message="CPU !!!" repetition="1" defaut="0" ID="AfficheYeux" fps="40"/>
                    </Sequence>
                    <Sequence>
                        <Condition ID="TiretteLaserPresente"/>
                        <Action message="{camp}" repetition="1" defaut="0" ID="AfficheYeux" fps="30"/>
                    </Sequence>
                    <Sequence>
                        <Condition ID="MinuterieDemarree"/>
                        <Condition ID="MinuterieNonEcoulee"/>
                        <Action ms="10000" ID="Attendre"/>
                        <Action ID="RecupererLeScore" score="{score}"/>
                        <Action message="{score}" repetition="1" defaut="0" ID="AfficheYeux" fps="30"/>
                    </Sequence>
                    <Sequence>
                        <Inverter>
                            <Condition ID="MinuterieNonEcoulee"/>
                        </Inverter>    
                        <Action ms="5000" ID="Attendre"/>
                        <Action ID="RecupererLeScore" score="{score}"/>
                        <Action message="{score}" repetition="1" defaut="0" ID="AfficheYeux" fps="15"/>
                    </Sequence>
                </ReactiveFallback>
            </ForceSuccess>
        </RealParallel>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="Palets zone chaos">
        <ForceSuccess>
            <BlackboardCheckString return_on_mismatch="FAILURE" value_A="{palet_chaos}" value_B="1">
                <Sequence>
                    <!--RetryUntilSuccesful num_attempts="3">
                        <Action ID="Aller" theta="90"  x="-0.5" y="0.0" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="contourner les palets par l'extÃ©rieur"/>
                    </RetryUntilSuccesful>
                    <RetryUntilSuccesful num_attempts="3">
                        <Action ID="Aller" theta="-90"  x="0.0" y="0.0" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="contourner les palets par l'extÃ©rieur"/>
                    </RetryUntilSuccesful>
                    <RetryUntilSuccesful num_attempts="3">
                        <Action ID="Aller" theta="-90"  x="0.0" y="-0.7" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="contourner les palets par l'extÃ©rieur"/>
                    </RetryUntilSuccesful>
                    <RetryUntilSuccesful num_attempts="3">
                        <Action ID="Aller" theta="-150"  x="-0.55" y="-1.2" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="contourner les palets par l'extÃ©rieur"/>
                    </RetryUntilSuccesful>
                    <ReactiveSequence>
                        <Condition ID="LaVoieEstLibre-Derriere" />
                        <VitesseConstante linear_x="-0.1" linear_y="0.0" angular_z="0.0" />
                        <Action ms="2000" ID="Attendre"/>
                    </ReactiveSequence-->
                    <Action ID="AjouterAuScore" score="16"/>
                    <SetBlackboard value="0" output_key="palet_chaos"/>
                </Sequence>
            </BlackboardCheckString>
        </ForceSuccess>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <TreeNodesModel>
        <Control ID="RealParallel" />
        <Action ID="AfficheYeux">
            <input_port default="0" name="defaut">1 = message par dÃ©faut</input_port>
            <input_port default="4" name="fps">Frame per second (image animÃ©e)</input_port>
            <input_port name="message">Message ou nom de l'image</input_port>
            <input_port default="1" name="repetition">Nombre d'itÃ©ration</input_port>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="AjouterAuScore">
            <input_port name="score"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="VitesseConstante">
            <input_port name="linear_x"/>
            <input_port name="linear_y"/>
            <input_port name="angular_z"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="RestartRosbags" />
        <Action ID="Aller">
            <input_port name="theta"/>
            <input_port name="x"/>
            <input_port name="y"/>
            <input_port name="y"/>
            <input_port name="x_mul"/>
            <input_port name="y_mul"/>
            <input_port name="theta_mul"/>
            <input_port name="comment"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="ArreterLaMinuterie"/>
        <Action ID="Attendre">
            <input_port name="ms"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="DefinirLeScore">
            <input_port name="score"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="DefinirPosition">
            <input_port name="theta"/>
            <input_port name="x"/>
            <input_port name="y"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="RecupererLeScore">
            <output_port name="score"/>
        </Action>
        <SubTree ID="Initialisation"/>
        <Action ID="Arreter le robot" />
        <Condition ID="TiretteLaserPresente"/>
        <Condition ID="LaVoieEstLibre-Devant"/>
    <Condition ID="LaVoieEstLibre-Gauche"/>
   <Condition ID="LaVoieEstLibre-Droite"/>
    <Condition ID="LaVoieEstLibre-Derriere"/>

        <Action ID="LancerLaMinuterie">
            <input_port name="seconds"/>
        </Action>
        <SubTree ID="Minuterie"/>
        <Condition ID="MinuterieDemarree"/>
        <Condition ID="MinuterieNonEcoulee"/>
        <Condition ID="RobotPret"/>
        <Condition ID="ScoreInferieurA">
            <input_port name="score"/>
        </Condition>
        <SubTree ID="Trier les palets"/>
        <SubTree ID="Yeux"/>
        <Action ID="JouerUnRosbag">
            <input_port name="nom"/>
            <input_port name="topics"/>
        </Action>
    </TreeNodesModel>
    <!-- ////////// -->
</root>

<!--Action ID="Aller" theta="90"  x="0.30" y="1.15" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="contourner les palets par l'extÃ©rieur"/>
<Action ID="Aller" theta="180" x="0.30" y="1.05" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="se placer face aux palets"/>

<Action ID="Aller" theta="270" x="0.05" y="1.25" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="avancer dans la zone de tri"/>
<Action ID="Aller" theta="180" x="0.05" y="1.25" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="se tourner en direction de la case verte"/>
<Action ID="Aller" theta="180" x="-0.25" y="1.25" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="dÃ©poser le palet dans la case verte"/>
<Action ID="Aller" theta="180" x="0.1" y="1.25" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="reculer pour libÃ©rer le palet"/-->

    <!--Action ID="Aller" theta="90" x="0.1" y="1.05" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="remonter sur la ligne des palets"/>
<Action ID="Aller" theta="180" x="0.1" y="1.05" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="se tourner vers les palets rouges"/>
<Action ID="Aller" theta="180" x="-0.55" y="1.05" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="capturer les deux palets"/>
<Action ID="Aller" theta="270" x="-0.55" y="1.05" y_mul="{y_mul}" theta_mul="{theta_mul}" comment="se tourner en direction de la case rouge"/>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree outlines a robot's navigation system with periodic global path replanning at 1 Hz and recovery actions. The RecoveryNode specifies that the robot will attempt to navigate with replanning for a maximum of 6 retries. Within this, the Sequence "NavigateWithReplanning" is controlled by a RateController set at 1 Hz and includes a Fallback node for handling goal reaching and computing paths to poses. Following this, the robot executes the "FollowPath" task.

In case of failure, the "RecoveryActions" sequence is triggered, which includes the action "Spin". This indicates that if the robot encounters difficulties in navigating or following the planned path, it will engage in spinning as a recovery strategy.
output:
<!--
  This Behavior Tree replans the global path periodically at 1 Hz and it also has
  recovery actions.
-->
<root main_tree_to_execute="MainTree">
  <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
    <RecoveryNode number_of_retries="6">
      <Sequence name="NavigateWithReplanning">
        <RateController hz="1.0">
          <Fallback>
            <GoalReached/>
            <ComputePathToPose goal="${goal}" path="${path}"/>
          </Fallback>
        </RateController>
        <FollowPath path="${path}"/>
      </Sequence>
      <SequenceStar name="RecoveryActions">
        <Spin/>
      </SequenceStar>
    </RecoveryNode>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input: The behavior tree consists of a single task that sets the value of "test" in the robot's memory to 1 and keeps running indefinitely. This means that once the value is set, the task will continue to run without failure, repeatedly setting the value of "test" to 1.
output:
<root main_tree_to_execute="MainTree">
	<BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
		<KeepRunningUntilFailure>
			<Sequence>
  			<SetBlackboard output_key="test" value="1" />

			</Sequence>
		</KeepRunningUntilFailure>
	</BehaviorTree>
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input: The behavior tree outlines a task for a robot to perform. The robot is programmed to track an action, smile, and then move towards a specific goal location in a loop for three cycles. During each cycle, the robot will set a new goal location and navigate towards it using a predefined behavior tree file. If any step fails, it will be forced to succeed. This behavior tree essentially orchestrates the robot's actions, ensuring it tracks, smiles, and navigates towards the specified goal locations within the given parameters.
output:
<root main_tree_to_execute = "MainTree">
    <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
        <Sequence>
          <TrackAction mode="Track" rate="3" detect_voice="0" turn_base="0" />
	        <Repeat num_cycles="3">
	            <Sequence>
	                <SmileAction level="3" duration_ms="2000" />
	                <SetBlackboard output_key="Goal_a" value="-5.40,-5.37,90.0" />
	                <Sequence>
	                 <ForceSuccess>
	                    <Nav2Client goal="{Goal_a}" behavior_tree="/home/ubuntu/robot_ws/follow_point_elsabot.xml" />
                   </ForceSuccess>
	                </Sequence>

	            </Sequence>
	        </Repeat>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree orchestrates a robot's repetitive task of detecting human poses and responding with speech. The robot will continuously repeat the sequence, which involves detecting a human pose (either left or right) and then speaking out the corresponding message. If the expected pose is not detected, it will fallback to speaking a default message.

In summary, the behavior tree enables the robot to repeatedly detect human poses, respond with appropriate speech, and handle fallback scenarios if the expected poses are not detected. This process continues indefinitely as indicated by the high number of cycles specified in the repeat node.
output:
<root main_tree_to_execute="MainTree">
	<BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
		<Repeat num_cycles="9999">
			<Sequence>
				<Sequence>
					<Fallback>
						<Sequence>
							<HumanPoseDetect expected_pose_left="" expected_pose_right=""
								pose_left_speech="{pose_left_speech}" pose_right_speech="{pose_right_speech}" />
						</Sequence>
						<TextToSpeechActionClient msg="Left, " msg2="{pose_left_speech}" />
					</Fallback>
					<Fallback>
						<Sequence>
							<HumanPoseDetect expected_pose_left="" expected_pose_right=""
								pose_left_speech="{pose_left_speech}" pose_right_speech="{pose_right_speech}" />
						</Sequence>
						<TextToSpeechActionClient msg="Right, " msg2="{pose_right_speech}" />
					</Fallback>
				</Sequence>
			</Sequence>
		</Repeat>
	</BehaviorTree>
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree orchestrates the actions of a robotic system. It begins by attempting to detect faces and then selects a specific face from the detected ones. The robot then performs parallel tasks, gazing at the selected face while also checking if the face's x-coordinate is less than 1.0. If it is, the robot stretches its arm; otherwise, it moves its arms to a home position. After this, the robot repeats the process or moves its arms to a low position.

If an error state occurs, the robot speaks in Portuguese, waits for 60 seconds, and then repeats the process. Additionally, there are various predefined actions such as moving the robot's base, detecting blocks, speaking, and waiting for a specified amount of time.

The behavior tree indicates that the robot is designed to interact with its environment, perform specific actions based on detected stimuli, handle errors, and execute predefined behaviors.
output:
<root main_tree_to_execute="BehaviorTree">
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="BehaviorTree">
        <Fallback>
            <Sequence>
                <Action pose_array="face_array" topic="faces" ID="GetPoseArray" name="GetFaceList"/>
                <Action pose_array="{face_array}" ID="SelectPose" pose_stamped="face" position_in_list="0"/>
                <Parallel threshold="2">
                    <Action ID="GazeAtTarget" fixation_pose="{face}" frame_id="base_footprint" action_name="gaze"/>
                    <Fallback>
                        <Sequence>
                            <Action output_val="x_thresh" ID="SelectFieldFromPoseStamped" field="x" pose_stamped="{face}"/>
                            <Condition ID="CompareDouble" A="{x_thresh}" Condition="<" B="1.0"/>
                            <ReactiveSequence>
                                <Action output_val="y_thresh" ID="SelectFieldFromPoseStamped" field="y" pose_stamped="{face}"/>
                                <Action topic="/vizzyArmRoutines/command" ID="ArmRoutines" gesture="STRETCH"/>
                            </ReactiveSequence>
                        </Sequence>
                        <SubTree ID="LowArms"/>
                    </Fallback>
                </Parallel>
            </Sequence>
            <SubTree ID="LowArms"/>
        </Fallback>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="ErrorGameState">
        <SequenceStar>
            <Action ID="Speak" language="pt_PT" action_name="nuance_speech_tts" voice="Joaquim" utterance="NÃ£o sei o estado do jogo"/>
            <Action ID="Speak" language="pt_PT" action_name="nuance_speech_tts" voice="Joaquim" utterance="Chamem o assistente"/>
            <Action ID="WaitForXSeconds" result="SUCCESS" seconds="60"/>
        </SequenceStar>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="LowArms">
        <Action topic="/vizzyArmRoutines/command" ID="ArmRoutines" gesture="HOME"/>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <TreeNodesModel>
        <Action ID="ArmCartesian">
            <input_port name="action_name"/>
            <input_port name="frame_id"/>
            <input_port name="pose"/>
            <input_port name="type"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="ArmRoutines">
            <input_port name="gesture"/>
            <input_port name="topic"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="Charge">
            <input_port name="action"/>
            <input_port name="action_name"/>
        </Action>
        <SubTree ID="ChargeST"/>
        <Action ID="CheckBattery">
            <output_port name="battery_state" type="int"/>
            <output_port name="percentage" type="double"/>
            <input_port name="service_name" type="std::string"/>
        </Action>
        <Condition ID="CheckBool">
            <input_port name="variable"/>
        </Condition>
        <Action ID="CheckCharging">
            <output_port name="charging_state" type="int"/>
            <input_port name="service_name" type="std::string"/>
        </Action>
        <Condition ID="CompareDouble">
            <input_port name="A"/>
            <input_port name="B"/>
            <input_port name="Condition"/>
        </Condition>
        <Condition ID="CompareInt">
            <input_port name="A"/>
            <input_port name="B"/>
            <input_port name="Condition"/>
        </Condition>
        <Action ID="DetectBlocks">
            <output_port name="block_list" type="social_cues::BlockList_<std::allocator<void> >"/>
            <input_port name="block_topic" type="std::string"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="DetectFaces">
            <output_port name="faceListOut"/>
            <input_port name="face_topic"/>
        </Action>
        <SubTree ID="ErrorGameState"/>
        <Action ID="FaceCounter">
            <input_port name="faceListIn"/>
            <input_port name="number_faces"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="GazeAtTarget">
            <input_port name="action_name"/>
            <input_port name="fixation_pose"/>
            <input_port name="frame_id"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="GetInt16">
            <output_port name="number"/>
            <input_port name="topic"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="GetPoseArray">
            <output_port name="pose_array"/>
            <input_port name="topic"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="MoveBase">
            <input_port name="action_name"/>
            <input_port name="frame_id"/>
            <input_port name="goal_pose"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="SelectBlock">
            <input_port name="block_list" type="social_cues::BlockList_<std::allocator<void> >"/>
            <output_port name="block_pose" type="geometry_msgs::PoseStamped_<std::allocator<void> >"/>
            <input_port name="position_in_list" type="std::string"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="SelectFieldFromPoseStamped">
            <input_port name="field"/>
            <output_port name="output_val"/>
            <input_port name="pose_stamped"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="SelectPose">
            <input_port name="pose_array"/>
            <output_port name="pose_stamped"/>
            <input_port name="position_in_list"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="Speak">
            <input_port name="action_name" type="std::string"/>
            <input_port name="language" type="std::string"/>
            <input_port name="utterance" type="std::string"/>
            <input_port name="voice" type="std::string"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="WaitForXSeconds">
            <input_port default="SUCCESS" name="result">Result after specified time: SUCCESS or FAILURE</input_port>
            <input_port default="5" name="seconds">Time in seconds</input_port>
        </Action>
    </TreeNodesModel>
    <!-- ////////// -->
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree represents a complex decision-making process for a robotic system. It involves multiple actions and conditions to handle various scenarios. The tree structure includes repetitive sequences with fallback mechanisms, reactive sequences, and conditional checks.

The robot is designed to execute a series of actions based on the input parameters provided. These actions include movement (e.g., move, stay, pick, drop), detection, replanning requests, and updating logical transition language (LTL) states. The tree also incorporates error handling through force failure nodes and condition checks.

The overall goal appears to be orchestrating the robot's behavior in dynamic environments by reacting to events, performing tasks according to predefined logic, and managing state transitions. The tree seems to prioritize robustness and adaptability, ensuring that the robot can handle unexpected situations and adjust its actions accordingly.
output:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root main_tree_to_execute="BehaviorTree">
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="BehaviorTree">
        <Repeat num_cycles="{num_cycles}">
            <Sequence>
                <Fallback>
                    <Condition ID="LTLPreCheck" ltl_state_current="{ltl_state_current}" ltl_state_desired_sequence="{ltl_state_desired_sequence}" ltl_state_executed_sequence="{ltl_state_executed_sequence}"/>
                    <ForceFailure>
                        <Action ID="ReplanningRequestLevel2" ltl_state_current="{ltl_state_current}" ltl_state_executed_sequence="{ltl_state_executed_sequence}" replanning_request="{replanning_request}"/>
                    </ForceFailure>
                </Fallback>
                <ReactiveSequence>
                    <Fallback>
                        <Action ID="FakeDetectionLevel1" replanning_fake_input="{replanning_fake_input}"/>
                        <ForceFailure>
                            <Action ID="ReplanningRequestLevel1" ltl_state_current="{ltl_state_current}" ltl_state_executed_sequence="{ltl_state_executed_sequence}" replanning_request="{replanning_request}"/>
                        </ForceFailure>
                    </Fallback>
                    <Fallback>
                        <Condition ID="ReactiveLTLStateCheck" ltl_state_current="{ltl_state_current}" ltl_state_desired_sequence="{ltl_state_desired_sequence}"/>
                        <ForceFailure>
                            <Action ID="ReplanningRequestLevel2" ltl_state_current="{ltl_state_current}" ltl_state_executed_sequence="{ltl_state_executed_sequence}" replanning_request="{replanning_request}"/>
                        </ForceFailure>
                    </Fallback>
                    <Fallback>
                        <Action ID="FakeDetectionLevel3" replanning_fake_input="{replanning_fake_input}"/>
                        <ForceFailure>
                            <Action ID="ReplanningRequestLevel3" ltl_state_current="{ltl_state_current}" ltl_state_executed_sequence="{ltl_state_executed_sequence}" replanning_request="{replanning_request}"/>
                        </ForceFailure>
                    </Fallback>
                    <Fallback>
                        <Switch4 case_1="move" case_2="stay" case_3="pick" case_4="drop" variable="{bt_action_type}">
                            <Action ID="MoveAction" bt_action_type="{bt_action_type}" current_action="{current_action}" goal_sent="{goal_sent}" move_base_finished="{move_base_finished}" move_base_idle="{move_base_idle}"/>
                            <Action ID="StayAction" bt_action_type="{bt_action_type}" current_action="{current_action}" ltl_state_current="{ltl_state_current}"/>
                            <Action ID="PickAction" bt_action_type="{bt_action_type}" current_action="{current_action}" ltl_state_current="{ltl_state_current}"/>
                            <Action ID="DropAction" bt_action_type="{bt_action_type}" current_action="{current_action}" ltl_state_current="{ltl_state_current}"/>
                            <AlwaysFailure/>
                        </Switch4>
                        <ForceFailure>
                            <Action ID="ReplanningRequestLevel3" ltl_state_current="{ltl_state_current}" ltl_state_executed_sequence="{ltl_state_executed_sequence}" replanning_request="{replanning_request}"/>
                        </ForceFailure>
                    </Fallback>
                </ReactiveSequence>
                <Action ID="UpdateLTL" action_sequence="{action_sequence}" action_sequence_executed="{action_sequence_executed}" bt_action_type="{bt_action_type}" current_action="{current_action}" ltl_state_desired_sequence="{ltl_state_desired_sequence}"/>
            </Sequence>
        </Repeat>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <TreeNodesModel>
        <Action ID="BackNormalAction">
            <input_port name="bt_action_type"/>
            <input_port name="current_action"/>
            <inout_port name="ltl_state_current"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="DropAction">
            <input_port name="bt_action_type"/>
            <input_port name="current_action"/>
            <inout_port name="ltl_state_current"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="FakeDetectionLevel1">
            <input_port name="replanning_fake_input"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="FakeDetectionLevel2">
            <input_port name="replanning_fake_input"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="FakeDetectionLevel3">
            <input_port name="replanning_fake_input"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="GuideAction">
            <input_port name="bt_action_type"/>
            <input_port name="current_action"/>
            <inout_port name="ltl_state_current"/>
        </Action>
        <Condition ID="LTLPreCheck">
            <input_port name="ltl_state_current"/>
            <input_port name="ltl_state_desired_sequence"/>
            <inout_port name="ltl_state_executed_sequence"/>
        </Condition>
        <Action ID="LocomotionStart">
            <input_port name="locomotion_status"/>
        </Action>
        <Condition ID="LocomotionStatusCheck">
            <input_port name="locomotion_status"/>
        </Condition>
        <Action ID="MoveAction">
            <input_port name="bt_action_type"/>
            <input_port name="current_action"/>
            <output_port name="goal_sent"/>
            <input_port name="move_base_finished"/>
            <input_port name="move_base_idle"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="PickAction">
            <input_port name="bt_action_type"/>
            <input_port name="current_action"/>
            <inout_port name="ltl_state_current"/>
        </Action>
        <Condition ID="ReactiveLTLStateCheck">
            <input_port name="ltl_state_current"/>
            <input_port name="ltl_state_desired_sequence"/>
        </Condition>
        <Action ID="RecoveryStand">
            <input_port name="locomotion_status"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="ReplanningRequestLevel1">
            <input_port name="ltl_state_current"/>
            <inout_port name="ltl_state_executed_sequence"/>
            <inout_port name="replanning_request"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="ReplanningRequestLevel2">
            <input_port name="ltl_state_current"/>
            <inout_port name="ltl_state_executed_sequence"/>
            <inout_port name="replanning_request"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="ReplanningRequestLevel3">
            <input_port name="ltl_state_current"/>
            <inout_port name="ltl_state_executed_sequence"/>
            <inout_port name="replanning_request"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="StayAction">
            <input_port name="bt_action_type"/>
            <input_port name="current_action"/>
            <inout_port name="ltl_state_current"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="SynchronizedTransitionAction">
            <input_port name="bt_action_type"/>
            <input_port name="current_action"/>
            <inout_port name="ltl_state_current"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="UpdateLTL">
            <inout_port name="action_sequence"/>
            <inout_port name="action_sequence_executed"/>
            <output_port name="bt_action_type"/>
            <output_port name="current_action"/>
            <inout_port name="ltl_state_desired_sequence"/>
        </Action>
    </TreeNodesModel>
    <!-- ////////// -->
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree defines a sequence of actions for a robot or an autonomous agent. The main task involves navigating through a series of predefined locations, with fallbacks and sequences to handle different scenarios.

Initially, the agent attempts to execute "go1", followed by a sequence that includes "go2" and "go6". If any of these fail, it resorts to "go3", "go4", and "go5" in a fallback manner. After this, it proceeds with "go7" and "go8".

The behavior tree also includes various other actions such as resource management ("mineResource", "mineResources"), waiting ("waitFrames", "waitFrames2", "waitFrames3"), and movement ("moveBaseToGoal"). These actions likely support the primary navigation task or provide additional functionalities.

Overall, the behavior tree orchestrates the agent's decision-making process, guiding it through a set of predefined actions and handling contingencies through fallbacks and sequences.
output:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root main_tree_to_execute="BehaviorTree">
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="BehaviorTree">
        <Fallback>
            <Action ID="go1"/>
            <Sequence name="Sequence2">
                <Action ID="go2"/>
                <Fallback>
                    <Action ID="go3"/>
                    <Action ID="go4"/>
                    <Action ID="go5"/>
                </Fallback>
                <Action ID="go6"/>
            </Sequence>
            <Action ID="go7"/>
            <Action ID="go8"/>
        </Fallback>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <TreeNodesModel>
        <Action ID="dumpRun"/>
        <Action ID="go1"/>
        <Action ID="go2"/>
        <Action ID="go3"/>
        <Action ID="go4"/>
        <Action ID="go5"/>
        <Action ID="go6"/>
        <Action ID="go7"/>
        <Action ID="go8"/>
        <Action ID="goClosestR"/>
        <Condition ID="isFull"/>
        <Action ID="mineResource"/>
        <Action ID="mineResources"/>
        <Action ID="moveBaseToGoal">
            <input_port name="key_name">goal</input_port>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="stay1"/>
        <Action ID="stay2"/>
        <Action ID="waitFrames">
            <output_port name="barout"/>
            <input_port name="baz"/>
            <input_port name="fooin"/>
            <input_port default="15" name="frames">frames</input_port>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="waitFrames2">
            <input_port default="15" name="frames">frames</input_port>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="waitFrames3">
            <inout_port default="4" name="d_one">has default</inout_port>
            <inout_port name="d_zero">d1</inout_port>
            <input_port default="2" name="frames"/>
            <input_port name="stagger">not a real argument, the other has a default</input_port>
        </Action>
    </TreeNodesModel>
    <!-- ////////// -->
</root>

output:
