instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree represents a decision-making process for an autonomous vehicle. The vehicle's actions are determined by various conditions and actions defined in the tree nodes model. 

The main behavior tree, "BehaviorTree," consists of a fallback node named "Core_seq" which contains sequences and conditions to manage the vehicle's navigation and mission state. It includes checking mission wait, stopping the vehicle, initializing path generation, handling lane keeping and lane change scenarios, traffic light checks, and managing mission states such as arrival at the goal.

The tree utilizes a range of conditions like checking collision, lane change feasibility, proximity to objects, irregularities, and specific states such as lane change left or right. Additionally, it employs actions including path generation, setting vehicle state, publishing data, and stopping at traffic lights.

In summary, the behavior tree orchestrates the decision-making process for the autonomous vehicle, ensuring safe and efficient navigation while adhering to mission objectives and traffic regulations.
output:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root main_tree_to_execute="BehaviorTree">
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="BehaviorTree">
        <Fallback name="Core_seq">
            <Sequence name="">
                <Condition ID="checkMissionWait"/>
                <Action ID="stop"/>
            </Sequence>
            <Sequence>
                <Sequence name="init">
                    <Condition ID="checkExistPathGlobal"/>
                    <Fallback name="">
                        <Sequence name="">
                            <Condition ID="checkStateLaneKeeping"/>
                            <Condition ID="checkFailLaneChange"/>
                            <Action ID="callPathGlobal"/>
                        </Sequence>
                        <AlwaysSuccess/>
                    </Fallback>
                    <Action ID="init"/>
                    <Sequence name="gen path">
                        <Fallback name="StateSelect">
                            <Sequence name="LaneKeeping">
                                <Condition ID="checkStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                <Action ID="genPathLaneKeeping"/>
                                <Sequence name="LaneKeeping">
                                    <Fallback name="">
                                        <Sequence name="">
                                            <Condition ID="checkGlobalLaneChange"/>
                                            <Fallback name="">
                                                <Sequence name="">
                                                    <Condition ID="checkLeftChange"/>
                                                    <Fallback name="">
                                                        <Sequence name="">
                                                            <Condition ID="checkLaneChangeableLeft"/>
                                                            <Action ID="genPathLaneChangeLeft"/>
                                                            <Fallback name="">
                                                                <Sequence name="">
                                                                    <Fallback name="">
                                                                        <Condition ID="checkObjectStaticLeftLane"/>
                                                                        <Condition ID="checkCollisionBehindLeft"/>
                                                                    </Fallback>
                                                                    <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                                                </Sequence>
                                                                <Action ID="setStateLaneChangeLeft"/>
                                                            </Fallback>
                                                        </Sequence>
                                                        <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                                    </Fallback>
                                                </Sequence>
                                                <Sequence name="">
                                                    <Condition ID="checkLaneChangeableRight"/>
                                                    <Action ID="genPathLaneChangeRight"/>
                                                    <Fallback name="">
                                                        <Sequence name="">
                                                            <Fallback name="">
                                                                <Condition ID="checkObjectStaticRightLane"/>
                                                                <Condition ID="checkCollisionBehindRight"/>
                                                            </Fallback>
                                                            <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                                        </Sequence>
                                                        <Action ID="setStateLaneChangeRight"/>
                                                    </Fallback>
                                                </Sequence>
                                                <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                            </Fallback>
                                        </Sequence>
                                        <Sequence name="check Collision">
                                            <Condition ID="checkFrontObject"/>
                                            <Fallback name="">
                                                <Sequence name="lane_keeping">
                                                    <Inverter>
                                                        <Condition ID="checkIrregularFront"/>
                                                    </Inverter>
                                                    <Fallback name="lane_keeping">
                                                        <Condition ID="checkNearCorner"/>
                                                        <Condition ID="checkObjectNearGoal"/>
                                                        <Condition ID="checkMeNearGoal"/>
                                                    </Fallback>
                                                    <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                                </Sequence>
                                                <Fallback name="lane_change">
                                                    <Sequence>
                                                        <Condition ID="checkProfitLaneChangeLeft"/>
                                                        <Fallback>
                                                            <Sequence name="">
                                                                <Fallback>
                                                                    <Condition ID="checkObjectStaticLeftLane"/>
                                                                    <Condition ID="checkIrregularLeft"/>
                                                                </Fallback>
                                                                <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                                            </Sequence>
                                                            <Sequence name="">
                                                                <Condition ID="checkLaneChangeableLeft"/>
                                                                <Action ID="genPathLaneChangeLeft"/>
                                                                <Fallback name="">
                                                                    <Sequence name="">
                                                                        <Fallback name="">
                                                                            <Condition ID="checkObjectStaticLeftLane"/>
                                                                            <Condition ID="checkCollisionBehindLeft"/>
                                                                        </Fallback>
                                                                        <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                                                    </Sequence>
                                                                    <Action ID="setStateLaneChangeLeft"/>
                                                                </Fallback>
                                                            </Sequence>
                                                            <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                                        </Fallback>
                                                    </Sequence>
                                                    <Sequence>
                                                        <Condition ID="checkProfitLaneChangeRight"/>
                                                        <Fallback>
                                                            <Sequence>
                                                                <Fallback>
                                                                    <Condition ID="checkObjectStaticRightLane" name="checkObjectStaticRigtLane"/>
                                                                    <Condition ID="checkIrregularRight"/>
                                                                </Fallback>
                                                                <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                                            </Sequence>
                                                            <Sequence>
                                                                <Condition ID="checkLaneChangeableRight"/>
                                                                <Action ID="genPathLaneChangeRight"/>
                                                                <Fallback name="">
                                                                    <Sequence name="">
                                                                        <Fallback name="">
                                                                            <Condition ID="checkObjectStaticRightLane"/>
                                                                            <Condition ID="checkCollisionBehindRight"/>
                                                                        </Fallback>
                                                                        <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                                                    </Sequence>
                                                                    <Action ID="setStateLaneChangeRight"/>
                                                                </Fallback>
                                                            </Sequence>
                                                            <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                                        </Fallback>
                                                    </Sequence>
                                                </Fallback>
                                            </Fallback>
                                        </Sequence>
                                        <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                    </Fallback>
                                    <Fallback name="">
                                        <Condition ID="checkMustLaneChange"/>
                                        <AlwaysSuccess/>
                                    </Fallback>
                                </Sequence>
                            </Sequence>
                            <Sequence name="LaneChangeLeft">
                                <Condition ID="checkStateLaneChangeLeft"/>
                                <Fallback name="">
                                    <Sequence name="">
                                        <Condition ID="checkEndLaneChange"/>
                                        <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                        <Action ID="callPathGlobal"/>
                                    </Sequence>
                                    <Action ID="speedProfileLaneChange"/>
                                </Fallback>
                            </Sequence>
                            <Sequence name="LaneChangeRigth">
                                <Condition ID="checkStateLaneChangeRight"/>
                                <Fallback name="">
                                    <Sequence name="">
                                        <Condition ID="checkEndLaneChange"/>
                                        <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                                        <Action ID="callPathGlobal"/>
                                    </Sequence>
                                    <Action ID="speedProfileLaneChange"/>
                                </Fallback>
                            </Sequence>
                            <Sequence name="Recovery">
                                <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
                            </Sequence>
                        </Fallback>
                        <Fallback name="traffic check">
                            <Condition ID="checkPassAbleTrafficLight"/>
                            <Action ID="stopTrafficLight"/>
                        </Fallback>
                        <Fallback name="unprotectedTurn">
                            <Sequence>
                                <Condition ID="checkUnprotected"/>
                                <Condition ID="checkImpassalbeUnprotected"/>
                                <Action ID="stop"/>
                            </Sequence>
                            <AlwaysSuccess/>
                        </Fallback>
                    </Sequence>
                </Sequence>
                <Action ID="setPath"/>
                <Action ID="publishData"/>
                <Fallback name="mission state">
                    <Sequence>
                        <Condition ID="checkArriveGoal"/>
                        <Action ID="setStateMissionArrive"/>
                        <Action ID="publishStateMission"/>
                    </Sequence>
                    <Sequence>
                        <Action ID="setStateMissionGoing"/>
                    </Sequence>
                </Fallback>
            </Sequence>
        </Fallback>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <TreeNodesModel>
        <Action ID="acc"/>
        <Action ID="callPathGlobal"/>
        <Action ID="callPathGlobalLeft"/>
        <Action ID="callPathGlobalRight"/>
        <Condition ID="checkAbleAstar"/>
        <Condition ID="checkArriveGoal"/>
        <Condition ID="checkCollision"/>
        <Condition ID="checkCollisionBehindLeft"/>
        <Condition ID="checkCollisionBehindRight"/>
        <Condition ID="checkEndLaneChange"/>
        <Condition ID="checkExistPathGlobal"/>
        <Condition ID="checkFailLaneChange"/>
        <Condition ID="checkFrontObject"/>
        <Condition ID="checkGlobalLaneChange"/>
        <Condition ID="checkImpassalbeUnprotected"/>
        <Condition ID="checkIrregularFront"/>
        <Condition ID="checkIrregularLeft"/>
        <Condition ID="checkIrregularRight"/>
        <Condition ID="checkLaneChange"/>
        <Condition ID="checkLaneChangeableLeft"/>
        <Condition ID="checkLaneChangeableRight"/>
        <Condition ID="checkLeftChange"/>
        <Condition ID="checkMeNearGoal"/>
        <Condition ID="checkMissionWait"/>
        <Condition ID="checkMustLaneChange"/>
        <Condition ID="checkNearCorner"/>
        <Condition ID="checkNearStopline"/>
        <Condition ID="checkObjectNearGoal"/>
        <Condition ID="checkObjectStaticLeftLane"/>
        <Condition ID="checkObjectStaticRightLane"/>
        <Condition ID="checkPassAbleTrafficLight"/>
        <Condition ID="checkProfitLaneChangeLeft"/>
        <Condition ID="checkProfitLaneChangeRight"/>
        <Condition ID="checkStateLaneChangeLeft"/>
        <Condition ID="checkStateLaneChangeRight"/>
        <Condition ID="checkStateLaneKeeping"/>
        <Condition ID="checkUnprotected"/>
        <Action ID="genPathLaneChangeLeft"/>
        <Action ID="genPathLaneChangeRight"/>
        <Action ID="genPathLaneKeeping"/>
        <Action ID="init"/>
        <Action ID="laneChangeLeft"/>
        <Action ID="laneChangeRight"/>
        <Action ID="publishData"/>
        <Action ID="publishStateMission"/>
        <Action ID="setPath"/>
        <Action ID="setStateLaneChangeLeft"/>
        <Action ID="setStateLaneChangeRight"/>
        <Action ID="setStateLaneKeeping"/>
        <Action ID="setStateMissionArrive"/>
        <Action ID="setStateMissionGoing"/>
        <Action ID="speedProfileLaneChange"/>
        <Action ID="stop"/>
        <Action ID="stopTrafficLight"/>
    </TreeNodesModel>
    <!-- ////////// -->
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree represents the decision-making process for a character in a game or simulation. The character has various actions and conditions that determine its behavior. 

The main tree consists of a fallback node, which contains two branches. The first branch includes a sequence of actions: getting a target, moving, and then checking if the target is adjacent. If the target is adjacent, the character will attack the target. The second branch involves the character making a random move. 

The character has several conditions such as IsDay, IsFemale, IsHungry, IsMale, and IsNight, along with actions like AttackTarget, GetTarget, Move, RandomMove, and Sleep.

In summary, the behavior tree dictates that the character will prioritize attacking a target if it is adjacent, otherwise it will perform a random move. This decision-making process is influenced by various conditions such as time of day, gender, and hunger level.
output:
<root main_tree_to_execute="MainTree">
    <!--  ===================================  -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
        <Fallback>
            <SequenceStar name="Main">
                <Action ID="GetTarget"/>
                <Action ID="Move"/>
                <Sequence>
                    <Condition ID="TargetAdjacent"/>
                    <Action ID="AttackTarget"/>
                </Sequence>
            </SequenceStar>
            <Action ID="RandomMove"/>
        </Fallback>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!--  ===================================  -->
    <TreeNodesModel>
        <Action ID="AttackTarget"/>
        <Action ID="GetTarget"/>
        <Condition ID="IsDay"/>
        <Condition ID="IsFemale"/>
        <Condition ID="IsHungry"/>
        <Condition ID="IsMale"/>
        <Condition ID="IsNight"/>
        <Action ID="Move"/>
        <Action ID="RandomMove"/>
        <Action ID="Sleep"/>
        <Condition ID="TargetAdjacent"/>
    </TreeNodesModel>
    <!--  ===================================  -->
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree orchestrates a robotic system to perform tasks in a sequential manner. The robot first attempts to recognize a specific color (specified by "{color}") and moves towards the identified color point ("{color_point}"). If unsuccessful, it retries until successful. Following this, the robot waits for a specified time ("{wait_time}"), and then proceeds to recognize a hole at a certain location ("{hole_point}"). It calculates the launcher angle based on the recognized hole and launches an object using the calculated angle.

The tree utilizes various actions such as recognizing color and holes, path planning, calculating launcher angles, and launching objects. Additionally, it incorporates retry mechanisms to handle potential recognition failures. The behavior tree is designed to coordinate these actions to achieve a specific task, likely related to robotic manipulation or automation.
output:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<root main_tree_to_execute="BehaviorTree">
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="BehaviorTree">
        <Sequence>
            <Sequence>
                <RetryUntilSuccesful num_attempts="">
                    <Action Color="{color}" ID="RecColor" Point="{color_point}"/>
                </RetryUntilSuccesful>
                <Action ID="MoveGoal" TargetPoint="{target_point}"/>
                <ForceSuccess>
                    <Action ID="Wait" WaitTime="{wait_time}"/>
                </ForceSuccess>
            </Sequence>
            <Sequence>
                <RetryUntilSuccesful num_attempts="">
                    <Action Hole="{hole_point}" ID="RecHole"/>
                </RetryUntilSuccesful>
                <Action ID="CalcLuncherAngle" LuncherAng="{lnchr_ang}"/>
                <Action ID="Launch" LauncherAng="{lnchr_ang}"/>
            </Sequence>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <TreeNodesModel>
        <Action ID="CalcLuncherAngle">
            <output_port default="{lnchr_ang}" name="LuncherAng"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="Launch">
            <input_port default="{lnchr_ang}" name="LauncherAng"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="MoveGoal">
            <inout_port default="{target_point}" name="TargetPoint"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="PathPlan">
            <input_port default="{map}" name="Map"/>
            <output_port default="{path}" name="Path"/>
            <input_port default="{color_point}" name="Point"/>
            <output_port default="{target_point}" name="TargetPoint"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="RecColor">
            <input_port default="{color}" name="Color"/>
            <output_port default="{point}" name="Point"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="RecHole">
            <output_port default="{Hole}" name="Hole"/>
        </Action>
        <Action ID="Wait">
            <input_port default="{wait_time}" name="WaitTime"/>
        </Action>
    </TreeNodesModel>
    <!-- ////////// -->
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree represents the decision-making process for a robot. The robot is programmed to perform various tasks based on different conditions and actions. 

It follows a hierarchical structure where it first attempts to autonomously navigate and accomplish tasks. If it encounters obstacles or failures, it resorts to seeking human assistance.

The main sequence "Autonomous" encompasses several sub-sequences and actions:
1. It checks if the room is known and decides whether to follow a predefined path or follow a human.
2. If a bottle is found, it proceeds to locate and grasp it. 
3. If the bottle is successfully grasped, it performs a series of actions related to positioning and grasping.

If any of these tasks fail, the robot will ask for help as a last resort.

Overall, the behavior tree outlines the robot's decision-making process in performing autonomous tasks and seeking assistance when necessary.
output:
<root main_tree_to_execute="BehaviorTree">
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <BehaviorTree ID="BehaviorTree">
        <Fallback name="Main">
            <Sequence name="Autonomus">
                <Fallback name="ReachRoom">
                    <Sequence name="ShouldFollow">
                        <Condition ID="RoomKnown"/>
                        <Fallback name="GoToRoom_Fal">
                            <Condition ID="RobotInRoom"/>
                            <Action ID="GoToRoom"/>
                        </Fallback>
                    </Sequence>
                    <Action ID="FollowHuman"/>
                </Fallback>
                <Fallback name="BottleFound">
                    <Condition ID="BottleFound"/>
                    <Action ID="FindBottle"/>
                </Fallback>
                <Fallback name="Fetch">
                    <Condition ID="BottleGrasped"/>
                    <Sequence name="Grasp">
                        <Fallback name="InvPoseCompute">
                            <Sequence name="SeqInvPose">
                                <Condition ID="InvPoseComputed"/>
                                <Condition ID="InvPoseValid"/>
                            </Sequence>
                            <Action ID="ComputeInvPose"/>
                        </Fallback>
                        <Fallback name="GoInvPose">
                            <Condition ID="RobotAtInvPose"/>
                            <Sequence name="prepare">
                                <Action ID="KeepArmsForGrasp"/>
                                <Action ID="GoToInvPose"/>
                            </Sequence>
                        </Fallback>
                        <Fallback name="Locate">
                            <Condition ID="BottleLocated"/>
                            <Action ID="LocateBottle"/>
                        </Fallback>
                        <Action ID="GraspBottle"/>
                    </Sequence>
                    <Action ID="SetInvPoseInvaild"/>
                </Fallback>
            </Sequence>
            <Action ID="AskForHelp"/>
        </Fallback>
    </BehaviorTree>
    <!-- ////////// -->
    <TreeNodesModel>
        <Action ID="AskForHelp"/>
        <Condition ID="BottleFound"/>
        <Condition ID="BottleGrasped"/>
        <Condition ID="BottleLocated"/>
        <Action ID="ComputeInvPose"/>
        <Action ID="FindBottle"/>
        <Action ID="FollowHuman"/>
        <Action ID="GoToInvPose"/>
        <Action ID="GoToRoom"/>
        <Action ID="GraspBottle"/>
        <Condition ID="InvPoseComputed"/>
        <Condition ID="InvPoseValid"/>
        <Action ID="KeepArmsForGrasp"/>
        <Action ID="KeepRunning"/>
        <Action ID="LocateBottle"/>
        <Condition ID="RobotAtInvPose"/>
        <Condition ID="RobotInRoom"/>
        <Condition ID="RoomKnown"/>
        <Action ID="SetInvPoseInvaild"/>
    </TreeNodesModel>
    <!-- ////////// -->
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree is designed for a robot's navigation and path planning. It periodically replans the global path at 1 Hz and includes recovery actions in case of failures. The main sequence initializes the blackboard, adjusts parameters related to costmaps and footprints, and then enters the main loop for navigation with replanning.

Within the main loop, it checks people's status frequently, avoids obstacles based on their walking speed and direction, and computes paths accordingly. If someone needs to be avoided, it informs the costmap about who should be removed or not. It also handles scenarios where the robot needs to avoid people while navigating.

In case of any failure during path following, it triggers recovery actions such as clearing the costmap around the robot and reattempting path computation. The tree ensures that the robot can navigate safely, avoid obstacles, and recover from potential failures during its navigation tasks.
output:
<!--
 Copyright (c) 2020  Carnegie Mellon University

 Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
 of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
 in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
 to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
 copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
 furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:

 The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
 copies or substantial portions of the Software.

 THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
 IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
 FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
 AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
 LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
 OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
 SOFTWARE.
-->

<!--
  This Behavior Tree replans the global path periodically at 1 Hz and it also has
  recovery actions.
-->

<root main_tree_to_execute="MainTree">
  <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
    <RestoreConfig name="Restore_footprint_publisher" node_name="/footprint_publisher">
    <RestoreConfig name="Restore_global_costmap" node_name="/global_costmap/global_costmap">
      <Sequence>
	<!-- initialize blackboard -->
	<SetBlackboard output_key="current_side" value="center"/>
	<SetBlackboard output_key="config_changed" value="false"/>

	<!-- use center for normal, 0.5 makes transition sudden, but small number cause issue
             passing close to obstacles -->
	<ChangeParam node_name="/global_costmap/global_costmap"
		     param_name="navcog_path_layer.walk_weight"
		     param_value="[0.1, 0.0, 0.1]"  name="ChangeParamToCenter"/>

	<ChangeParam node_name="/global_costmap/global_costmap"
		     param_name="navcog_path_layer.path_adjusted_center"
		     param_value="-0.5"  name="ChangeParamPathAdjustedCenter1"/>
	
	<ChangeParam node_name="/planner_server"
		     param_name="NavCog.path_adjusted_center"
		     param_value="-0.5"  name="ChangeParamPathAdjustedCenter2"/>
	
	<!-- default footprint is smallest, so change the footprint to normal -->
	<ChangeParam node_name="/footprint_publisher"
		     param_name="footprint_mode"
		     param_value="0"  name="ChangeParamToNormal"/>

	<!-- compute a path -->
	<RecoveryNode number_of_retries="999999999" name="InitialComputePathRepeat">
	  <Sequence name="ComputePathSequence">
	    <!-- clear costmap -->
	    <ClearEntireCostmap name="ClearGlobalCostmap-context" server_timeout="5000"
				service_name="/global_costmap/clear_entirely_global_costmap"/>
	    
	    <WaitFloat wait_duration_float="0.5"/>
	    <CurrentPose global_frame="map" robot_base_frame="base_footprint" pose="{current_pose}" />
	    <ComputePathToPose start="{current_pose}" goal="{goal}" path="{navcog_path}" planner_id="NavCog"/>
	    <PathToPoses path="{navcog_path}" goals="{navcog_goals}" />
	    <PublishTopicPath topic="path_out" value="{navcog_path}"/> <!-- for debug -->
	    <!-- wait long enough to include neighbor obstacles -->
	    <WaitFloat wait_duration_float="0.5"/>
	    <ComputePathThroughPoses goals="{navcog_goals}" path="{path}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
	    <!-- do not remove this plan topic, this is used by ROS1 node -->
	    <PublishTopicPath topic="plan" value="{path}"/>
	    <!-- front vibration -->
	    <PublishTopic topic="/cabot/event" value="navigation;event;navigation_start" />
	  </Sequence>
	  <ForceSuccess>
	    <WaitFloat wait_duration_float="0.5"/>
	  </ForceSuccess>
	</RecoveryNode>

	<!-- main loop -->
	<RecoveryNode number_of_retries="999999999" name="NavigateRecovery">
	  <!-- navigation -->
	  <PipelineSequence name="NavigateWithReplanning">

	    <!-- Check people status frequently -->
	    <RateController hz="2" name="AvoidPeople">
              <Fallback name="AvoidPersonFallback">
		<Sequence>
		  <!-- check if there is someone detecgted -->
		  <PeopleExist people_topic="people" people_out="{people}" />
		  <PeopleStops people="{people}" threshold="0.2" duration="2.0"/>
		  <!-- find people needs to be avoided based on there walking speed and walking direction -->
		  <NeedToAvoid people="{people}" robot_frame="base_footprint" path="{path}" avoid="{avoid}" avoid_count="{avoid_count}"/>

		  <!-- replaced with NeedToAvoid
		       <SomeoneOnPath path="{path}" people="{people}" person_out="{person}" range="0.5"/>
		      <FarEnough odom_topic="odom" max_acc="0.3" delay="0.2" min_threshold="0" max_threshold="7.0"
		      global_frame="map_global" robot_frame="base_footprint" person="{person}"/>
		  -->

		  <!-- let the costmap know who should be removed, who should not be removed -->
		  <IgnorePeople people="{avoid}" ignore_topic="ignore" wait_duration="0.5"/>

		  <CurrentPose global_frame="map" robot_base_frame="base_footprint" pose="{current_pose}" />
		  <ComputePathToPose start="{current_pose}" goal="{goal}" path="{navcog_path}" planner_id="NavCog"/>
		  <PathToPoses path="{navcog_path}" goals="{navcog_goals}" />
		  <PublishTopicPath topic="path_out" value="{navcog_path}"/> <!-- debug -->
		  <ComputePathThroughPoses goals="{navcog_goals}" path="{path}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
		  <!-- do not remove this plan topic, this is used by ROS1 node -->
		  <PublishTopicPath topic="plan" value="{path}"/>

		  <IfThenElse>
		    <BlackboardCheckInt value_A="{avoid_count}" value_B="1" return_on_mismatch="FAILURE">
		      <AlwaysSuccess/>
		    </BlackboardCheckInt>
		    <PublishTopic topic="/cabot/event" value="navigation;event;bt_navigator_avoid_person" />
		    <PublishTopic topic="/cabot/event" value="navigation;event;bt_navigator_avoid_people" />
		  </IfThenElse>
		  
		  <Wait wait_duration="5.0"/>
		  <!-- replaced with CanPassPerson, which publish path for navigation
		      <ComputePathToPose goal="{goal}" path="{path}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
		  -->
		</Sequence>
		<AlwaysSuccess/>
	      </Fallback>
	    </RateController>>

	    <!-- follow path -->
	    <ReactiveFallback>
	      <!-- if the goal is updated, abort following first, this will be recorvered by RecoveryComputePathRepeat -->
	      <GoalUpdated/>
	      <FollowPath path="{path}" controller_id="FollowPath" goal_checker_id="cabot_goal_checker"/>
	    </ReactiveFallback>
	  </PipelineSequence>

	  <!-- if follow path is aborted, compute path and try again -->
	  <RecoveryNode number_of_retries="999999999" name="RecoveryComputePathRepeat">
	    <Sequence name="ComputePathSequence">
	      <!-- clear costmap -->
	      <ClearCostmapAroundRobot name="ClearGlobalCostmapAroundRobot2" server_timeout="5000"
				       service_name="global_costmap/clear_around_global_costmap"
				       reset_distance="20" />
	      <ClearCostmapAroundRobot name="ClearLocalCostmapAroundRobot" server_timeout="5000"
				       service_name="local_costmap/clear_around_local_costmap"
				       reset_distance="20" />
	      
	      <!-- wait long enough to include neighbor obstacles -->
	      <Wait wait_duration="1.0"/>
	      <!-- do not reroute 
	      <ComputePathToPose goal="{goal}" path="{path}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
	      <CheckPath  path="{path_temp}" path_topic="/path" plan_topic="/plan" path_out="{path}" />
	      -->
	    </Sequence>
	    <AlwaysSuccess/>
	  </RecoveryNode>
	</RecoveryNode>
      </Sequence>
    </RestoreConfig>
    </RestoreConfig>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree outlines a task for a robot. It involves setting three goals (Goal_a, Goal_b, Goal_c) and waiting for 2 seconds between movements. The robot is programmed to move towards each goal sequentially, repeating the sequence indefinitely until interrupted by the "gohome" event. If interrupted, it will immediately proceed to the Goal_c location.

Additionally, the MoveRobot behavior tree specifies that the robot should move to the given target using the MoveBase action.

In summary, the robot's main task is to navigate to Goal_a, then Goal_b while incorporating waiting periods, and finally to Goal_c if not interrupted by the "gohome" event.
output:
<root main_tree_to_execute = "MainTree">
    <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
        <Sequence>
            <SetBlackboard output_key="Goal_a" value="1.17;-1.65;30" />
            <SetBlackboard output_key="Goal_b" value="1.1;1.51;90" />
            <SetBlackboard output_key="Goal_c" value="-1.25;0.324;0" />
            <SetBlackboard output_key="Waiting_time" value="2"/>
            <Fallback>
                <ReactiveSequence>
                    <InterruptEvent event="gohome"/>
                    <Repeat num_cycles="-1">
                        <Sequence>
                            <SubTree ID="MoveRobot" target="Goal_a" />
                            <WaitingEvent name="waiting_event" waiting_time="{Waiting_time}"/>
                            <SubTree ID="MoveRobot" target="Goal_b" />
                            <WaitingEvent name="waiting_event" waiting_time="{Waiting_time}"/>
                        </Sequence>
                    </Repeat>
                </ReactiveSequence>
                <Sequence>
                    <SubTree ID="MoveRobot" target="Goal_c" />
                </Sequence>
            </Fallback>
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>

    <BehaviorTree ID="MoveRobot">
        <Sequence name="SetGoal">
            <MoveBase goal="{target}" />
        </Sequence>
    </BehaviorTree>
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree is designed for a robot to navigate through an environment with periodic global path replanning at 1 Hz and includes recovery actions. The robot will attempt to navigate to a specified goal, using the "GridBased" planner for computing the path. If the navigation encounters issues, it will clear the global costmap context and retry once. Then, it will follow the computed path using the "FollowPath" controller and clear the local costmap context if needed.

In case of further failures or updates in the goal, the recovery fallback mechanism is triggered. This includes clearing both the local and global costmaps, performing a spin movement, and waiting for a duration before attempting navigation again. The recovery node allows for a maximum of 6 retries, providing robustness in navigating complex environments.
output:
<!--
  This Behavior Tree replans the global path periodically at 1 Hz and it also has
  recovery actions.
-->
<root main_tree_to_execute="MainTree">
  <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
    <RecoveryNode number_of_retries="6" name="NavigateRecovery">
      <PipelineSequence name="NavigateWithReplanning">
        <RateController hz="1.0">
          <RecoveryNode number_of_retries="1" name="ComputePathToPose">
            <ComputePathToPose goal="{goal}" path="{path}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
            <ClearEntireCostmap name="ClearGlobalCostmap-Context" service_name="global_costmap/clear_entirely_global_costmap"/>
          </RecoveryNode>
        </RateController>
        <RecoveryNode number_of_retries="1" name="FollowPath">
          <FollowPath path="{path}" controller_id="FollowPath"/>
          <ClearEntireCostmap name="ClearLocalCostmap-Context" service_name="local_costmap/clear_entirely_local_costmap"/>
        </RecoveryNode>
      </PipelineSequence>
      <ReactiveFallback name="RecoveryFallback">
        <GoalUpdated/>
        <SequenceStar name="RecoveryActions">
          <ClearEntireCostmap name="ClearLocalCostmap-Subtree" service_name="local_costmap/clear_entirely_local_costmap"/>
          <ClearEntireCostmap name="ClearGlobalCostmap-Subtree" service_name="global_costmap/clear_entirely_global_costmap"/>
          <Spin spin_dist="1.57"/>
          <Wait wait_duration="5"/>
        </SequenceStar>
      </ReactiveFallback>
    </RecoveryNode>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree is designed for a robot to navigate through an environment with periodic global path replanning and recovery actions. The main components of the behavior tree include setting various parameters for the robot's navigation system, handling path computation and following, and implementing recovery actions in case of failures.

The sequence starts by configuring specific parameters related to the robot's footprint, speed, goal tolerance, costmap weights, and inflation radius. It then enters the main loop, where it periodically computes a new path to the goal while checking for obstacles or people to avoid. If necessary, it updates the global costmap and recalculates the path. Once the path is determined, the robot follows it using a specified controller.

In case of any issues during navigation, the recovery actions are triggered, including clearing the global and local costmaps and waiting before resuming navigation.

Overall, the behavior tree ensures that the robot can navigate effectively, adapt to dynamic environments, and recover from potential navigation challenges.
output:
<!--
 Copyright (c) 2020  Carnegie Mellon University

 Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
 of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
 in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
 to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
 copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
 furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:

 The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
 copies or substantial portions of the Software.

 THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
 IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
 FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
 AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
 LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
 OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
 SOFTWARE.
-->

<!--
    This Behavior Tree replans the global path periodically at 1 Hz and it also has
    recovery actions.
-->

<root main_tree_to_execute="QueueTree">
  <BehaviorTree ID="QueueTree">
    <RestoreConfig node_name="/footprint_publisher">
      <RestoreConfig node_name="/controller_server">
	<RestoreConfig node_name="/global_costmap/global_costmap">
	  <Sequence>
	    <!-- set the footprint as small -->
	    <ChangeParam node_name="/footprint_publisher"
			 param_name="footprint_mode"
			 param_value="3"  name="ChangeParamFootprintToSmall"/>
	    
	    <ChangeParam node_name="/controller_server"
			 param_name="FollowPath.max_vel_x"
			 param_value="0.5"  name="ChangeParamSpeedDown"/>
	    
	    <ChangeParam node_name="/controller_server"
			 param_name="cabot_goal_checker.xy_goal_tolerance"
			 param_value="0.20"  name="ChangeParamFollowPathXyGoalTolerance"/>
	    <ChangeParam node_name="/controller_server"
			 param_name="cabot_goal_checker.yaw_goal_tolerance"
			 param_value="0.20"  name="ChangeParamFollowPathYawGoalTolerance"/>
	    
	    <ChangeParam node_name="/global_costmap/global_costmap"
			 param_name="navcog_path_layer.walk_weight"
			 param_value="[0.3, 0.0, 0.3] "  name="ChangeParamWalkWeightToCenter"/>
	    <!-- 1: use adjust mode to use actual center of the corridor based on costmap
		 0: use navcog path as the ceter of the corridor -->
	    <ChangeParam node_name="/global_costmap/global_costmap"
			 param_name="navcog_path_layer.path_mode"
			 param_value="0"  name="ChangeParamToAdjust"/>
	    <ChangeParam node_name="/global_costmap/global_costmap"
			 param_name="navcog_path_layer.path_adjusted_center"
			 param_value="0.0"  name="ChangeParamPathAdjustedCenter"/>
	    
	    <ChangeParam node_name="/global_costmap/global_costmap"
			 param_name="inflation_layer.inflation_radius"
			 param_value="0.2"  name="ChangeParamInflationRadius"/>
	    
	    <!-- compute a path -->
	    <RecoveryNode number_of_retries="999999999" name="InitialComputePathRepeat">
	      <Sequence name="ComputePathSequence">
		<!-- clear costmap -->
		<!--
		<ClearCostmapAroundRobot name="ClearCostmapAroundRobot" server_timeout="5000"
					 service_name="global_costmap/clear_around_global_costmap"
					 window_size_x="20" window_size_y="20"/>
		-->
		<ClearEntireCostmap name="ClearGlobalCostmap-context" server_timeout="5000"
				    service_name="global_costmap/clear_entirely_global_costmap"/>
		
		<!-- wait long enough to include neighbor obstacles -->
		<WaitFloat wait_duration_float="0.5"/>
		<ComputePathToPose goal="{goal}" path="{path_temp}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
		<CheckPath  path="{path_temp}" path_topic="/path" plan_topic="/plan" path_out="{path}" />
		<!-- front vibration -->
		<!--
		<PublishTopicInt8 topic="/cabot/notification" value="5" />
		-->
	      </Sequence>
	      <ForceSuccess>
		<WaitFloat wait_duration_float="0.5"/>
	      </ForceSuccess>
	    </RecoveryNode>
	    
	    <!-- main loop -->
	    <RecoveryNode number_of_retries="999999999" name="NavigateRecovery">
	      <!-- navigation -->
	      <PipelineSequence name="NavigateWithReplanning">
		<!-- Check people status frequently -->
		<!-- find people needs to be avoided not in queue -->
		<!--
		<RateController hz="2" name="AvoidPeople">
		  <Fallback name="AvoidPersonFallback">
		    <Sequence name="AvoidPerson">
		      <PeopleExist people_topic="people" people_out="{people}"/>
		      <NeedToAvoid people="{people}" robot_frame="base_footprint" path="{path}" avoid="{people_avoid}"/>
		      <SomeoneNotInQueue queue_topic="queue_people_py/queue" people="{people_avoid}" people_out_not_queue="{people_avoid_not_queue}"/>
		      <IgnorePeople people="{people_avoid_not_queue}" ignore_topic="ignore" wait_duration="0.5"/>
		      <ComputePathToPose goal="{goal}" path="{path_temp}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
		      <CheckPath current="{path}" path="{path_temp}" path_topic="/path" plan_topic="/plan" path_out="{path}" />
		      <Wait wait_duration="5"/>
		    </Sequence>
		    <AlwaysSuccess/>
		  </Fallback>
		</RateController>
		-->
		<RateController hz="2.0" name="UpdatePath">
		  <RecoveryNode number_of_retries="1" name="UpdatePathRecovery">
		    <Sequence>
		      <ClearEntireCostmap name="UpdatePathClearGlobalCostmap-context" server_timeout="5000"
					  service_name="global_costmap/clear_entirely_global_costmap"/>
		      <WaitFloat wait_duration_float="0.5"/>
		      <ComputePathToPose goal="{goal}" path="{path_temp}" planner_id="GridBased"/>
		      <CheckPath  path="{path_temp}" path_topic="/path" plan_topic="/plan" path_out="{path}" />
		    </Sequence>
		    <ForceSuccess>
		      <WaitFloat wait_duration_float="0.5"/>
		    </ForceSuccess>
		  </RecoveryNode>
		</RateController>
		
		<!-- follow path -->
		<RecoveryNode number_of_retries="1" name="FollowPathRecovery">
		  <FollowPath path="{path}" controller_id="FollowPath" />
		  <AlwaysSuccess/>
		</RecoveryNode>
	      </PipelineSequence>
	      
	      <!-- recovery -->
	      <SequenceStar name="RecoveryActions">
		<ClearEntireCostmap name="Recovery-ClearGlobalCostmap-context" server_timeout="5000"
                                    service_name="/global_costmap/clear_entirely_global_costmap"/>
		<ClearEntireCostmap name="Recovery-ClearLocalCostmap-Context" server_timeout="5000"
				    service_name="/local_costmap/clear_entirely_local_costmap"/>
		<Wait wait_duration="1.0"/>
	      </SequenceStar>
	    </RecoveryNode>
	  </Sequence>
	</RestoreConfig>
      </RestoreConfig>
    </RestoreConfig>
  </BehaviorTree>
</root>

instruction: You will be provided a summary of a task performed by a behavior tree, and your objective is to express this behavior tree in XML format.
input:
The behavior tree represents a robot's task of interacting with humans to play a game. The robot goes through a sequence of actions, including detecting poses, speaking and listening, finding objects, and moving towards specific locations. It repeats this sequence 10 times.

If the "needs_init" condition is met, the robot guides the human through setting up the game by giving instructions, waiting for the human to perform specific poses, and ensuring the correct positioning of objects. Once the setup is complete, the robot initiates the game by guiding the human to different locations, providing feedback on their performance, and concluding the game.

Throughout the process, the robot uses various sensors and actuators to interact with the environment and communicate with the human. The behavior tree demonstrates a complex interaction involving speech recognition, object detection, human pose recognition, and navigation.
output:
<root main_tree_to_execute="MainTree">
	<BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
		<Repeat num_cycles="10">
			<Sequence>
				<Delay delay_msec="1000">
					<PoseDetectionControlAction enable="true" />
				</Delay>
				<TrackAction mode="Track" rate="3" detect_voice="0" turn_base="0" />

				<!-- Spin a bit to get localized in the case the initial pose was just set -->
				<RobotSpin angle="-180" velocity="0.4" />
				<RobotSpin angle="180" velocity="0.4" />

				<RobotFindInitAction game_file="robot_find.json" object_type="shapes" random_order="0" needs_init="{needs_init}" robot_pose="{robot_pose}" />

				<!--
				<ForceSuccess>
					<Sequence>
						<BlackboardCheckInt value_A="{needs_init}" value_B="0" return_on_mismatch="FAILURE">
							<Sequence>
								<TextToSpeechActionClient msg="Do you want to setup the game?" />
								<SpeechToTextActionClient text="{said}" />
								<TextCompareAction text="{said}" ck_for=".*(yes|yeah|okay|ok|sure|yep).*" />
								<SetBlackboard output_key="needs_init" value="1" />
							</Sequence>
  					</BlackboardCheckInt>
					</Sequence>
				</ForceSuccess>
        -->

				<Fallback>
					<BlackboardCheckInt value_A="{needs_init}" value_B="1" return_on_mismatch="FAILURE">
						<Sequence>
							<TrackAction mode="Track" rate="3" detect_voice="0" turn_base="1" />
							<TextToSpeechActionClient msg="Game setup. I will ask you to stand at each of the locations.  Put both hands on your hips when you arrive at each location to continue." />
							<ForceSuccess>
								<Sequence>
									<TextToSpeechActionClient msg="Please send in the middle of the game. After the robot aligns to you, put both hands on your hips." />
									<RetryUntilSuccesful num_attempts="20">
										<Delay delay_msec="2000">
											<HumanPoseDetect expected_pose_left="OnHip" expected_pose_right="OnHip" pose_lr_check="both" detected_person="{detected_person}" pose_left_speech="{pose_left_speech}" pose_right_speech="{pose_right_speech}" />
										</Delay>
									</RetryUntilSuccesful>
									<TrackAction mode="Track" rate="3" detect_voice="0" turn_base="0" />
								</Sequence>
							</ForceSuccess>

							<ForceSuccess>
								<KeepRunningUntilFailure>
									<Sequence>
										<RobotFindNextStepAction item_name="{item_name}" />
										<TextToSpeechActionClient msg="Please stand on " msg2="{item_name}" />
										<RetryUntilSuccesful num_attempts="20">
											<Delay delay_msec="2000">
												<Sequence>
													<HumanPoseDetect expected_pose_left="OnHip" expected_pose_right="OnHip" pose_lr_check="both" detected_person="{detected_person}" pose_left_speech="{pose_left_speech}" pose_right_speech="{pose_right_speech}" />
													<ObjectLocationStatusAction x="{x}" y="{y}" />
													<RobotFindSetPositionAction x="{x}" y="{y}" />
												</Sequence>
											</Delay>
										</RetryUntilSuccesful>
									</Sequence>
								</KeepRunningUntilFailure>
							</ForceSuccess>
							<TextToSpeechActionClient msg="Finished setting up" />
							<TrackAction mode="Track" rate="3" detect_voice="0" turn_base="0" />
						</Sequence>
					</BlackboardCheckInt>

					<Sequence>
						<Nav2Client goal="{robot_pose}" />
						<TextToSpeechActionClient msg="Let's play the game!" />

						<TrackAction mode="Track" rate="3" detect_voice="0" turn_base="0" />
						<ForceSuccess>
							<KeepRunningUntilFailure>
								<Sequence>
									<RobotFindNextStepAction item_name="{item_name}" />
									<TextToSpeechActionClient msg="Please stand on " msg2="{item_name}" />
									<RetryUntilSuccesful num_attempts="200">
										<Delay delay_msec="1000">
											<Sequence>
												<ObjectLocationStatusAction x="{x}" y="{y}" />
												<RobotFindCheckStepAction x="{x}" y="{y}" />
												<TextToSpeechActionClient msg="Good job" />
											</Sequence>
										</Delay>
									</RetryUntilSuccesful>
								</Sequence>
							</KeepRunningUntilFailure>
						</ForceSuccess>
						<TextToSpeechActionClient msg="Finished playing the game" />
						<TrackAction mode="Track" rate="3" detect_voice="0" turn_base="0" />
					</Sequence>
				</Fallback>
			</Sequence>
		</Repeat>
	</BehaviorTree>
</root>
